storyInfo: Folinic, despondent after the loss of Atro, is consoled by Suzuran. The two begin to search for clues about Winterwisp. At the same time, GreyThroat's team encounter Mudrock, the Reunion leader in charge of the armed Infected.

attributes.content: How...?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: It's... awful...
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: A fire. It's already been dealt with. And some time has passed. But...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Here. Rhodes Island supply crates. With dates, serial numbers, everything.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: There's an outline in the ash. Looks like there was something rectangular sitting on the box?
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Maybe Atro's ID badge. She didn't like to wear it.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Operator Click, Operator Ayerscarpe, our situation has changed.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Y-yeah, I know already!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Since you and Ayers rescued me from the mountain, I'm more than glad to help!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Don't call me Ayers... *Sigh*. What has Leonhardt been telling you...?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: The Catastrophe was immensely destructive. Wolumonde will not be in better shape now. What were their Catastrophe Messengers doing?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Things wouldn't have gotten so bad if Leonhardt or Earthspirit was there...
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: No point thinking about that now... we should prepare for the worst.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Any objections to setting up camp outside the town?
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: None whatsoever!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: I am after all a professional Catastrophe Messenger bodyguard. And this is the 'wunderkind' who nearly got herself killed shooting videos deep in the Winterwisp Mountains.
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Why are you still rubbing salt into my wounded pride?!
attributes.name: Click

attributes.content: Just kidding. But... GreyThroat wouldn't want us to storm the town and kick in the doors of the mayor's office, would she?
attributes.name: Ayerscarpe

attributes.content: Sorry. Please be patient. I have to confirm what happened to Atro.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I'll be right back.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: ...Famine?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Yes. Famine ruins everyone.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I know what you're going to say. A town the size of Wolumonde should be self-sufficient.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: The day the Great Rift happened, there wasn't so much Originium breaking through the ground, carving the land up, ruining farms and granaries.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We've been very lucky, in fact. There haven't been any explosions in the town center or any of the very populated areas. But even so, the losses have been severe...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: That, on top of an inopportune season. We're well into autumn and we're on a course for the Winterwisp Mountains. Winter's coming early this year.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: We haven't announced it to the public yet, as to not cause a panic.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: And then we were stabbed in the back by our own people, unwitting as they may be.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What do we do then... about the traitors?
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Tatjana took the young people to survey the situation. No one could reach the power plant without a guide.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Each district should have its own auxiliary hauling equipment. What's the situation?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Too slow. At best an eighth the speed of the other towns. We wouldn't get out of the mountains before winter.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: We can't let anything happen to the granary. Send more men.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Men...? Even if we're talking old folks and children, anyone who's willing to carry a weapon is already...
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: But they wouldn't go so far as to attack the granary. That's tantamount to killing every last person in Wolumonde!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: You give them too much credit.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Um...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Go ahead.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Zwölftontechnik Strasse, the quarantine zone, is it as bleak as it is because...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Would you believe me if I told you we had to cut down on rations entirely because of the Infected population?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: No, it doesn't matter if you believe me or not. Would they believe me?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They would tear down the granary doors and count every last grain before they believed anything that came out of us.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So, do we let them tear it down?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I wouldn't mind a little open honesty if they really just wanted to take a look. But not everyone's going to let it end there.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Even without an official announcement, anyone smart enough would be able to figure it out with a calendar and a look at our route that Wolumonde is bound for a terrible winter famine.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: They stirred the people up into a frenzy, they looted. They're just thinking of themselves, making sure they can survive, whether or not it means someone else has to starve. To put it bluntly, they want an excuse to steal.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I believe Rhodes Island has the expertise of dealing with the Infected, like you say. Dr. Atro's professionalism and your combat skills proved that much.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Is Oripathy the only problem in the world?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Even at a time like this, I have to ask after Atro.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: That was a murder.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Everyone out! The Rhodes Islanders have something important to discuss with the Schultz!
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: Severin.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Then, I leave it to you.
attributes.name: Councilor

attributes.content: I guess this isn't a topic you can put on the agenda?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Should I have added 'murder' as 'old business' or 'new business?'
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It's all a consequence of your coverup. No, no need for formalities. I'm disgusted with you.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Rhodes Island Operator Atro was murdered in the course of her duties here in Wolumonde. And I need answers.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And, according to a particular Infected resident, they are also hunting this 'murderer.'
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Maybe the killer is one of those Infected. Like when a thief cries out 'thief!' Oldest trick in the book.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But before we discuss the murderer, I'd like—
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Stop. You don't have to say it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I do have enough of a conscience left that your request would wound me.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But Wolumonde needs Rhodes Island's help to get out of this mess. And there's no point in making things hard for you anymore.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Come with me.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What is this place...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Sorry about the... hasty handling. But they're mostly Infected. We had to put them somewhere underground to keep the others from panicking.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...It's cold.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I make sure to keep the refrigeration units running.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Impressive Arts. As to be expected from a Leithanian officer.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Eight victims.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Four from Wolumonde, Dr. Atro, and three Infected outlanders.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Including your son... Mr. Thorwald.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Tatjana told you that too, huh?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: It's true.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Because I wasn't there...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Here you are... Atro.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You... You really gave me the runaround here... Stupid cat.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Incredible... how can she tell...?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: (Could we... give them some space?)
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Alright.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: As strong as she is, I forgot she's just another girl trying her hardest to move on. Same age as Tatjana too.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Tatjana is... holding up.
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Hey! I told you to quit smoking!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Maybe...
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Smoking will only make your bronchitis worse!
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Are... are you...?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: You got it, little fox. You're sharper than I expected.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But do me a favor and keep it to yourself.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Do you... feel any better, Miss Folinic?
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Quite impressive, exhibiting such resilience at your age.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: I know my eyes are swollen. Are you mocking me?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You lost a good friend and you're still keeping your calm. What could I possibly mock you about?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: ...Things aren't over yet.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: You're right, it isn't. Now, I hope we can work together.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: What is this?
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: The Arts core of the L-44 'Gramophone' autonomous defense device. To put it bluntly, this is your murder weapon.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Of course, civilians aren't allowed to possess destructive power like this. But any educated Leithanian would know how to drive this core.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Overloading, heating, and igniting are all features of our town's defensive equipment. Originium Arts engineering is complex. Not everyone can use it.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: So this is it. Someone used this to kill Atro...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: We have to find the murderer.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: And then what?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: And then... I'll make them pay.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: How about that. You move past restlessness and sorrow, and you choose revenge.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Miss Folinic... we shouldn't...
attributes.name: Suzuran

attributes.content: I know.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: Of course I know. As a Rhodes Island Operator, as Dr. Kal'tsit's student, I should know better than anyone.
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: But the murderer, and the murderer alone, must face justice!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: What did Atro do? She was helping the Infected! What did she do to deserve this?!
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: At least...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: At least let me ask them... I have to know why...
attributes.name: Folinic

attributes.content: I understand.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Schultz Severin, Miss Suzuran, Miss Fol—
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Oh... Miss Folinic has already seen...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: They had their time together. You look flustered. Did something happen?
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Yes. During our inspection, a fight broke out between the Infected and the non-infected...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: Again.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But this time... the councilors weren't even able to calm them down. They're demanding a declaration of war against the armed Infected.
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: People must be starting to understand what it means to have our town's movement basically crippled... They can't hold it in any longer.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: But there's more... Many of the residents who were working with the Infected were themselves uninfected. They...
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: I already figured as much.
attributes.name: Severin

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Tatjana

attributes.content: The Winterwisps. Those damned savages. They're back to haunt Wolumonde again.
attributes.name: Severin
